name: Rick and Morty Character Search
description: A simple web app for visualizing Rick and Morty character API via name.

name: Workout Tracker
description: A full-stack web app to allow users to create and track their workouts and exercises.

name: On Tap
description: A MERN Stack full CRUD App to allow users to post and rate beers.    The app was created based on a vision of a social media app for users to share their local beer experiences and ratings.

name: SimplSurvey
description: SimplSurvey is a simple application where users can choose survey questions to answer from six different categories. The application also allows for execution of a customized survey of your choosing.
